item.title: 19 States Sue Biden Administration Over COVID-19 Vaccine Mandate
item.content:encoded: 19 States Sue Biden Administration Over COVID-19 Vaccine Mandate 美 19개주, 바이든 행정부 코로나 백신 의무화에 소송 Several U.S. states on Friday mounted multiple federal lawsuits against the Biden administration over its COVID-19 vaccine mandate for federal workers and contractors. 미국 여러 주가 바이든 행정부의 중공 바이러스(코로나19) 백신 접종 의무화에 맞서 법적 대응에 나섰다. Texas sued individually in a federal court in Galveston

item.title: A Mom’s Research (Part 3): Who Are the Real Racists?
item.content:encoded: A Mom’s Research (Part 3): Who Are the Real Racists? [칼럼] 엄마의 연구③ 진짜 인종차별주의자는 누구인가(상) Commentary 들어가는 말 One day, my 17-year-old daughter showed me a Facebook post that said 74.5 percent of hate crimes between 1992 and 2014 against Asian Americans were from white offenders. The purpose of the post was to ask Asians to fight alongside the Black Lives Matter movement to “improve minority communities.” 어느 날, 17살 된 딸이 나에

item.title: The 10 Radical New Rules That Are Changing America
item.content:encoded: The 10 Radical New Rules That Are Changing America [칼럼] 미국을 뒤바꾸고 있는 급진적 ‘새’ 원칙 10가지 There are 10 new ideas that are changing America, maybe permanently. 미국을 영구적으로 변화시키고 있는 10가지 새로운 규칙들이 있다. 1. Money is a construct. 1. 화폐는 그냥 찍어내면 된다. It can be created from thin air. Annual deficits and aggregate national debt no longer matter much. 현재 미국에서는 돈을 그냥 찍어

item.title: A Mom’s Research (Part 2): Texas Freezing and Global Warming
item.content:encoded: A Mom’s Research (Part 2): Texas Freezing and Global Warming [칼럼] 엄마의 연구② 텍사스의 기록적 한파와 지구 온난화 Commentary 들어가는 말 A few days ago, my husband and I were chatting about the freezing weather in Texas and the resulting blackouts. My daughter got grumpy when she heard us and said, “So you don’t believe in global warming?” 며칠 전, 나는 남편과 텍사스의 기록적 한파와 그로 인해 발생한 정전에 관해 이야기를

item.title: A Mom’s Research (Part 1): Nordic Countries Aren’t Socialist Paradises
item.content:encoded: A Mom’s Research (Part 1): Nordic Countries Aren’t Socialist Paradises [칼럼] 엄마의 연구① 북유럽 국가들은 사회주의 낙원일까? Commentary 들어가는 말 As the mother of a 17-year-old in a deep-blue state, I am often asked questions about socialism and communism. Not always being able to answer them, I have to do extensive research. I guess this is the situation many Epoch Times readers encounter: having to discuss these topics with family and friends. 17살 아이

item.title: Young Mom in Menopause With No Chance of Pregnancy Gives Birth to Baby: ‘Miracles Do Happen’
item.content:encoded: Young Mom in Menopause With No Chance of Pregnancy Gives Birth to Baby: ‘Miracles Do Happen’ 조기 폐경 美 젊은 엄마, 셋째 출산 화제…“출산 경험을 나눌 수 있는 건 축복” A young mom of two who went into premature menopause at 28 thought her dreams of having a third child were crushed. However, she was in complete disbelief a year later when her pregnancy test came out positive—the news seemed unreal. 28살에 조기 폐경을 겪은 두 아이의 엄마는

item.title: Congress Demands Action Against Facebook After Hearing Whistleblower Testimony
item.content:encoded: Congress Demands Action Against Facebook After Hearing Whistleblower Testimony 美 의회 페이스북 청문회 “유해성 알고도 방관…곧 조처할 것” The Senate Subcommittee on Consumer Protection, Product Safety, and Data Security heard testimony Tuesday from Facebook whistleblower Frances Haugen, a former employee of the tech giant. In a rare show of bipartisanship, a bloc of Republicans and Democrats joined together to demand action against the company. 페이스북 소비

item.title: 美 직장인 퇴사율 2개월 연속 역대 최고...기업들 구인난 가중
item.content:encoded: Record Number of American Workers Quit Their Jobs, Signaling Labor Market Squeeze 美 직장인 퇴사율 2개월 연속 역대 최고...기업들 구인난 가중 A record number of American workers quit their jobs as of the last business day of September, in a sign of continued labor market tightness that is upping pressure on businesses to boost wages to attract and retain staff. 미국에서 직장을 그만둔 근로자 수가 2개월 연속 역대 최다치를 기록했다. item.title: 비트코인 탭루트·슈노르 서명 업그레이드, 수혜자는 누구일까?
item.content:encoded: 사토시 나카모토가 지난 2009년 비트코인을 처음 만든 후 12년이 지났다. 사용량은 지속적으로 증가해 왔으며, 가격은 초기에 비해 기하 급수적으로 증가했다. 다만 지금의 관점에서 봤을 때 암호화폐로서 아쉬운 부분도 분명 존재한다. 우선 눈에 보이는 것은 수수료다. 수수료는 비트코인 사용량이 늘어날수록 문제가 된다. 비트코인이 지급·지불 수단 보다는 가치저장 수단으
